metadata.title: CVE-2022-4338 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer underflow in Organization Specific TLV was found in variousversions of OpenvSwitch.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4338` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvswitch-common - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-ipsec - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-pki - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-source - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-switch - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-switch-dpdk - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-test - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-testcontroller - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
openvswitch-vtep - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
python3-openvswitch - 3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvswitch package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.0~git20230108.006e1c6-1ubuntu1').
